name: Custom-Lodash
description: Your task is to implement 'custom' version of the lodash library following next requirements: 1. Usage of `Array.prototype.* or `Object.prototype.*` is **strictly forbidden**. 2. You can create your own additional service functions (if needed). 3. You should use ES6+ features (any feature which supported by latest stable Chrome). 4. Lodash chain is out of scope
author: Nikoloz Javakhishvili
